description:
Generates a matrix2 cifti from matrix4 wbsparse.

This command makes a cifti file from the fiber counts in a matrix4 wbsparse file, and optionally a second cifti file from the distances.  Note that while the total count is stored exactly, the per-fiber counts are stored as approximate fractions, so the output of -individual-fibers will contain nonintegers.

counts_out.title: counts_out
counts_out.description: the total fiber counts, as a cifti file

opt_distances_distance_out.title: opt_distances_distance_out
opt_distances_distance_out.description: output average trajectory distance: the distances, as a cifti file

anyOf.description: output files for each fiber direction

individual_fibers.description: output files for each fiber direction
